segments.content: Hello everyone!
segments.sourceMdx: Hello everyone!
segments.translated_content: 大家好！

segments.content: Another week with a lot of cool releases, like Reassure, FlashList or Bun 🤯
segments.sourceMdx: Another week with a lot of cool releases, like Reassure, FlashList or Bun 🤯
segments.translated_content: 本周又迎来诸多重磅发布，如Reassure、FlashList和Bun等令人惊叹的工具🤯

segments.content: Also 2 interactive articles👌
segments.sourceMdx: Also 2 interactive articles👌
segments.translated_content: 还有两篇交互式文章👌

segments.content: Towards the end of July, I'll switch to a bi-monthly rhythm. That's going to allow me to evolve the format of this newsletter a bit.
segments.sourceMdx: Towards the end of July, I'll switch to a bi-monthly rhythm. That's going to allow me to evolve the format of this newsletter a bit.
segments.translated_content: 七月底开始，我将调整为双周发布节奏。这将为本通讯的格式迭代提供空间。

segments.content: I often forget to mention it here, but I keep an [Indie Hacker](https://www.indiehackers.com/product/french-react-newsletter?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) page up to date: I report monthly on this newsletter with all my numbers: growth, sponsorship etc...

segments.content: ## React
segments.sourceMdx: ## React
segments.translated_content: ## React核心

segments.content: [**Reassure**](https://github.com/callstack/reassure?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.sourceMdx: [**Reassure**](https://github.com/callstack/reassure?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.translated_content: [**Reassure**](https://github.com/callstack/reassure?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.content: Reassure is a new React performance test library. Already presented previously, it has now been open-sourced by Callstack. It allows to post a report in a pull-request when perf regressions are detected. Example: a component that re-renders more slowly, or more often than before. For the moment only React-Native is supported, but web support will come very soon.
segments.sourceMdx: Reassure is a new React performance test library. Already presented previously, it has now been open-sourced by Callstack. It allows to post a report in a pull-request when perf regressions are detected. Example: a component that re-renders more slowly, or more often than before. For the moment only React-Native is supported, but web support will come very soon.
segments.translated_content: Reassure是全新的React性能测试库。此前已有介绍，现由Callstack开源。它能在检测到性能退化时（如组件渲染变慢或更频繁）在PR中生成报告。目前仅支持React-Native，但Web支持即将到来。

segments.content: [**How to animate multiplayer cursors**](https://liveblocks.io/blog/how-to-animate-multiplayer-cursors?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.sourceMdx: [**How to animate multiplayer cursors**](https://liveblocks.io/blog/how-to-animate-multiplayer-cursors?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.translated_content: [**如何实现多人协作光标动画**](https://liveblocks.io/blog/how-to-animate-multiplayer-cursors?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.content: A great interactive article that proposes to animate the mouse cursor on several browsers in real time. This is a more complicated problem than it seems. Each approach is illustrated with a React implementation and presents different tradeoffs: CSS transitions, spring, splines...
segments.sourceMdx: A great interactive article that proposes to animate the mouse cursor on several browsers in real time. This is a more complicated problem than it seems. Each approach is illustrated with a React implementation and presents different tradeoffs: CSS transitions, spring, splines...
segments.translated_content: 这篇精彩的交互式文章探讨了跨浏览器实时同步鼠标光标动画的实现。问题比表面更复杂，每种方案都配有React实现并呈现不同取舍：CSS过渡、弹簧动画、样条曲线...

segments.content: [**How to Use Next.js Middleware**](https://www.ctnicholas.dev/articles/how-to-use-nextjs-middleware?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.sourceMdx: [**How to Use Next.js Middleware**](https://www.ctnicholas.dev/articles/how-to-use-nextjs-middleware?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.translated_content: [**Next.js中间件使用指南**](https://www.ctnicholas.dev/articles/how-to-use-nextjs-middleware?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.content: Interactive article from the same author, presenting many middleware use cases. Already published here, it has just been updated following the official release of Next.js 12.2 which includes some breaking changes.
segments.sourceMdx: Interactive article from the same author, presenting many middleware use cases. Already published here, it has just been updated following the official release of Next.js 12.2 which includes some breaking changes.
segments.translated_content: 同作者的交互式文章，详解多种中间件应用场景。此前已发布，现根据Next.js 12.2正式版的破坏性变更进行了更新。

segments.content: [**10 Years Of Meteor**](https://meteor10.sachagreif.com/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.sourceMdx: [**10 Years Of Meteor**](https://meteor10.sachagreif.com/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.translated_content: [**Meteor十年历程**](https://meteor10.sachagreif.com/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.content: Sacha Grief (co-author of Discover Meteor, and also of the State of JS, CSS surveys...) takes a look back at 10 years of his personal history with the framework. Meteor has lost popularity, but remains used and has greatly influenced our frontend ecosystem.
segments.sourceMdx: Sacha Grief (co-author of Discover Meteor, and also of the State of JS, CSS surveys...) takes a look back at 10 years of his personal history with the framework. Meteor has lost popularity, but remains used and has greatly influenced our frontend ecosystem.
segments.translated_content: Sacha Grief（《Discover Meteor》合著者，JS/CSS现状调查发起人）回顾他与这个框架的十年渊源。Meteor虽热度减退但仍被使用，且深刻影响了前端生态。

segments.content: [**The mystery of React Element, children, parents and re-renders**](https://www.developerway.com/posts/react-elements-children-parents?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.sourceMdx: [**The mystery of React Element, children, parents and re-renders**](https://www.developerway.com/posts/react-elements-children-parents?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.translated_content: [**React元素、子组件、父组件与重渲染之谜**](https://www.developerway.com/posts/react-elements-children-parents?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.content: Nadia highlights some React behaviors that can be surprising or even counter-intuitive, and explains in which case a parent's re-render will trigger a child's re-render on various edge-cases.
segments.sourceMdx: Nadia highlights some React behaviors that can be surprising or even counter-intuitive, and explains in which case a parent's re-render will trigger a child's re-render on various edge-cases.
segments.translated_content: Nadia 重点解析了 React 中某些可能令人意外甚至反直觉的行为，并详细说明了在各种边界情况下父组件重渲染会触发子组件重渲染的具体场景。

segments.content: [**Storybook Community Showcase #2**](https://storybook.js.org/blog/community-showcase-2/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.sourceMdx: [**Storybook Community Showcase #2**](https://storybook.js.org/blog/community-showcase-2/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.translated_content: [**Storybook 社区精选案例第二期**](https://storybook.js.org/blog/community-showcase-2/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.content: Summary of the latest news from the Storybook community: Component Encyclopedia, Figma plugin, Story Explorer, and various addons: Variants, CSS variables, Recoil...
segments.sourceMdx: Summary of the latest news from the Storybook community: Component Encyclopedia, Figma plugin, Story Explorer, and various addons: Variants, CSS variables, Recoil...
segments.translated_content: Storybook 社区最新动态汇总：组件百科全书、Figma 插件、故事资源管理器，以及各类插件——变体管理、CSS 变量、Recoil 状态集成等。

segments.content: [**The new wave of React state management**](https://frontendmastery.com/posts/the-new-wave-of-react-state-management/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.sourceMdx: [**The new wave of React state management**](https://frontendmastery.com/posts/the-new-wave-of-react-state-management/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.translated_content: [**React 状态管理的新浪潮**](https://frontendmastery.com/posts/the-new-wave-of-react-state-management/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.content: Presents the different problems that state management libs have to solve, and compares some of them. Pre/post Redux retrospective. Complete article but quite long: not easy to read.
segments.sourceMdx: Presents the different problems that state management libs have to solve, and compares some of them. Pre/post Redux retrospective. Complete article but quite long: not easy to read.
segments.translated_content: 文章系统梳理了状态管理库需要解决的核心问题，并对主流方案进行横向对比。包含 Redux 时代的前后技术回顾。内容全面但篇幅较长，阅读门槛较高。

segments.content: **Extras:**
segments.sourceMdx: **Extras:**
segments.translated_content: **扩展阅读：**

segments.content:
* 📜 [Deploy Next.js 12.2 on Netlify today](https://www.netlify.com/blog/deploy-nextjs-12-2/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): Next.js latest edge features can run on Netlify too
* 📜 [Use Next.js 12.2 On-Demand ISR to automatically refresh stale data](https://jonmeyers.io/blog/use-next-js-12-2-on-demand-isr-and-supabase-function-hooks-to-automatically-refresh-stale-data?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
* 📖 [Thinking in Efffects](https://twitter.com/dan_abramov/status/1544090471655415810?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): new doc page, work-in-progress
* 🐦 [Remix + Svelte](https://twitter.com/crim_codes/status/1542684471195045889?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
* 🐦 [Astro Preact compat option](https://twitter.com/astrodotbuild/status/1542511038230237185?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
* 🎥 [A Fresh new web framework is out](https://www.youtube.com/watch?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter\&v=4boXExbbGCk)
* 📦 [FramerMotion 6.4](https://twitter.com/mattgperry/status/1544323698211045376?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): new hook useInView()
* 📦 [TanStack Table v8](https://twitter.com/tannerlinsley/status/1542925072502968320?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): new React-Table version is now framework-agnostic and also supports Svelte, Solid, Vue

segments.content: [**TechTree - Introducing This Week in React Bounty Board**](https://techtree.dev/t/sHBrozirH3xSY8jP3M7gGv?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.sourceMdx: [**TechTree - Introducing This Week in React Bounty Board**](https://techtree.dev/t/sHBrozirH3xSY8jP3M7gGv?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.translated_content: [**TechTree - 推出「本周 React 悬赏板」**](https://techtree.dev/t/sHBrozirH3xSY8jP3M7gGv?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.content: TechTree is building the first **social-economic platform for developers** - a place to help you unlock the real value of your knowledge and network!
segments.sourceMdx: TechTree is building the first **social-economic platform for developers** - a place to help you unlock the real value of your knowledge and network!
segments.translated_content: TechTree 正在打造首个面向开发者的社会经济平台——帮助您释放知识与人脉网络真正价值的空间！

segments.content: The first major feature on TechTree is Bounties, a tool to help you **earn money by referring your friends** to open roles at top VC backed tech startups or find a job that might be right for you!
segments.sourceMdx: The first major feature on TechTree is Bounties, a tool to help you **earn money by referring your friends** to open roles at top VC backed tech startups or find a job that might be right for you!
segments.translated_content: 平台首个重磅功能「悬赏任务」可助您通过推荐人才至顶级风投支持的科技公司开放岗位获得收益，或为自己匹配理想工作！

segments.content: To help show you around, I have gone ahead and created my very own Bounty board - **a selection of remote, React related roles for you to apply to or refer your network to**. There has been over $300k worth of Bounties claimed on TechTree so far!
segments.sourceMdx: To help show you around, I have gone ahead and created my very own Bounty board - **a selection of remote, React related roles for you to apply to or refer your network to**. There has been over $300k worth of Bounties claimed on TechTree so far!
segments.translated_content: 为方便您快速了解，我们特别创建了悬赏公告板——精选远程 React 相关职位供您申请或推荐人脉。目前平台累计发放悬赏金额已突破 30 万美元！

segments.content: Looking to hire React developers? You can post Bounties of your own to be featured on my Bounty board! Read more and get started [here](https://www.notion.so/techtreedev/Share-your-jobs-on-my-Bounty-board-c51d2d97d9f3421bab103c42097907ae?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter).
segments.sourceMdx: Looking to hire React developers? You can post Bounties of your own to be featured on my Bounty board! Read more and get started [here](https://www.notion.so/techtreedev/Share-your-jobs-on-my-Bounty-board-c51d2d97d9f3421bab103c42097907ae?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter).
segments.translated_content: 正在招聘React开发者？您可以发布自己的悬赏任务，展示在我的悬赏板上！点击[此处](https://www.notion.so/techtreedev/Share-your-jobs-on-my-Bounty-board-c51d2d97d9f3421bab103c42097907ae?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)了解更多并开始操作。

segments.content: [Storetasker: Freelance Shopify Devs network](https://www.storetasker.com/become-an-expert?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=thisweekinreact\&utm_source=thisweekinreact)
segments.sourceMdx: [Storetasker: Freelance Shopify Devs network](https://www.storetasker.com/become-an-expert?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=thisweekinreact&utm_source=thisweekinreact)
segments.translated_content: [Storetasker：Shopify自由开发者网络](https://www.storetasker.com/become-an-expert?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=thisweekinreact&utm_source=thisweekinreact)

segments.content: Hey! This is Tim from Storetasker. We run the best Shopify dev freelance network. I would love for you to apply if you enjoy building Shopify sites or are excited about leveraging Shopify's **cutting-edge React framework** for building custom storefronts: [**Hydrogen**](https://hydrogen.shopify.dev/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter).
segments.sourceMdx: Hey! This is Tim from Storetasker. We run the best Shopify dev freelance network. I would love for you to apply if you enjoy building Shopify sites or are excited about leveraging Shopify's **cutting-edge React framework** for building custom storefronts: [**Hydrogen**](https://hydrogen.shopify.dev/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter).
segments.translated_content: 大家好！我是Storetasker的Tim。我们运营着最优秀的Shopify开发者自由职业网络。如果您喜欢构建Shopify网站，或对利用Shopify的**前沿React框架**[**Hydrogen**](https://hydrogen.shopify.dev/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)构建定制店面感到兴奋，欢迎您申请加入。

segments.content: Accepted devs on the network work on a freelance basis, and we present them with great opportunities to work on some of the best Shopify brands (Alo Yoga, Chubbies, JUDY & many many more).
segments.sourceMdx: Accepted devs on the network work on a freelance basis, and we present them with great opportunities to work on some of the best Shopify brands (Alo Yoga, Chubbies, JUDY & many many more).
segments.translated_content: 通过审核的开发者将以自由职业者的身份工作，我们将为他们提供与顶级Shopify品牌（如Alo Yoga、Chubbies、JUDY等）合作的机会。

segments.content: The great thing about Storetasker is that devs aren't in competition with each other - they just pick up the jobs that match their interests. Beyond that - it's a very tight-knit community.
segments.sourceMdx: The great thing about Storetasker is that devs aren't in competition with each other - they just pick up the jobs that match their interests. Beyond that - it's a very tight-knit community.
segments.translated_content: Storetasker的独特之处在于开发者之间无需竞争——他们只需选择符合自己兴趣的任务。此外，这里还是一个非常紧密的社区。

segments.content: Feel free to apply directly via this [link](https://www.storetasker.com/become-an-expert?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=thisweekinreact\&utm_source=thisweekinreact) to join.
segments.sourceMdx: Feel free to apply directly via this [link](https://www.storetasker.com/become-an-expert?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=thisweekinreact&utm_source=thisweekinreact) to join.
segments.translated_content: 欢迎直接通过此[链接](https://www.storetasker.com/become-an-expert?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=thisweekinreact&utm_source=thisweekinreact)申请加入。

segments.content: ## React-Native
segments.sourceMdx: ## React-Native
segments.translated_content: ## React-Native

segments.content: [**FlashList - Fast & Performant React Native List**](https://shopify.github.io/flash-list/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.sourceMdx: [**FlashList - Fast & Performant React Native List**](https://shopify.github.io/flash-list/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.translated_content: [**FlashList - 高性能React Native列表组件**](https://shopify.github.io/flash-list/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.content: Shopify has just released FlashList, its alternative to FlatList to solve performance issues when scrolling and avoid showing empty cells. The goal is to keep 60fps even on low-end Android devices, without complicating the implementation. The library reuses already rendered cells: you'll have to adapt your use of React `key` to let it take over.
segments.sourceMdx: Shopify has just released FlashList, its alternative to FlatList to solve performance issues when scrolling and avoid showing empty cells. The goal is to keep 60fps even on low-end Android devices, without complicating the implementation. The library reuses already rendered cells: you'll have to adapt your use of React `key` to let it take over.
segments.translated_content: Shopify刚刚发布了FlashList，作为FlatList的替代方案，旨在解决滚动时的性能问题并避免显示空单元格。其目标是即使在低端Android设备上也能保持60fps，同时不增加实现的复杂性。该库会复用已渲染的单元格：您需要调整React `key`的使用方式以充分发挥其优势。

segments.content: [**React-Native-Compat-Table**](https://retyui.github.io/react-native-compat-table/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.sourceMdx: [**React-Native-Compat-Table**](https://retyui.github.io/react-native-compat-table/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.translated_content: [**React-Native-Compat-Table**](https://retyui.github.io/react-native-compat-table/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.content: Lists the API support of each React-Native runtime (JSC, V8, Android...) in a comprehensive way. The author also explains [why React Native recommends TS config lib: "es2017"](https://dev.to/retyui/why-react-native-typescript-config-recommends-to-use-a-five-years-old-standard-lib-es2017-3bjk?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.sourceMdx: Lists the API support of each React-Native runtime (JSC, V8, Android...) in a comprehensive way. The author also explains [why React Native recommends TS config lib: "es2017"](https://dev.to/retyui/why-react-native-typescript-config-recommends-to-use-a-five-years-old-standard-lib-es2017-3bjk?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.translated_content: 全面列出了每个React-Native运行时（JSC、V8、Android等）的API支持情况。作者还解释了[为什么React Native推荐TS配置库使用"es2017"](https://dev.to/retyui/why-react-native-typescript-config-recommends-to-use-a-five-years-old-standard-lib-es2017-3bjk?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)。

segments.content: ## Other
segments.sourceMdx: ## Other
segments.translated_content: ## 其他资讯

segments.content: [**Bun - an incredibly fast all-in-one JavaScript runtime.**](https://bun.sh/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.sourceMdx: [**Bun - an incredibly fast all-in-one JavaScript runtime.**](https://bun.sh/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
segments.translated_content: [**Bun —— 极速全栈JavaScript运行时**](https://bun.sh/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.content: A new JavaScript runtime that competes directly with Node.js and Deno on performance, based on JSC (not v8) and written in Zig. A complete toolchain with a bundler, transpiler, package manager and even test runner. We already talked about the Bun bundler last year but the scope has expanded to something larger, and v0.1 has just been released.
segments.sourceMdx: A new JavaScript runtime that competes directly with Node.js and Deno on performance, based on JSC (not v8) and written in Zig. A complete toolchain with a bundler, transpiler, package manager and even test runner. We already talked about the Bun bundler last year but the scope has expanded to something larger, and v0.1 has just been released.
segments.translated_content: 基于JSC（非V8）引擎并使用Zig语言编写的新JavaScript运行时，直接对标Node.js和Deno的性能。提供完整的工具链支持，包括打包器、转译器、包管理器和测试运行器。去年我们曾报道过Bun打包器，如今其范畴已扩展为更庞大的生态体系，并刚刚发布v0.1版本。
